page.title: 08OTHER FARMS
page.content: {Chicken Farm:}A large battery type chicken farm is built at Weston Lane between the A3 and the railway. Large notices at gates forbid entrance due to risk of disease. {Causeway Farm: This has recently become a riding stable, and its farmland sold off to other farmers. {Fairfield Farm:}This is now the Broadway Park Homes estate. 175 compact homes, each with their own plot of land form the park. Each plot is rented from the estate but the occupier owns the home. Most of the occupiers are retired people since one of the conditions of the park does not allow children or dogs. 3 large fields surrounding the homes are used to produce grass for outside contractors. Some sheep are brought in at the end of the season.{ {Horticulture:}A nursery is expanding at North Lane, Buriton.
